trans-unit.source: Defines interfaces used by internal .NET structures to initialize application configuration properties.
trans-unit.target: 定義內部.NET 結構用來初始化應用程式組態屬性的介面。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a context object for a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> of an application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回的內容物件<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>應用程式設定。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示應用程式組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a subpath location of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態項目之子路徑位置。

trans-unit.source: A context object for a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object of an application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 內容物件<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>應用程式設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a deprecated context object of the application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回應用程式設定的已被取代的內容物件。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a path to an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示應用程式組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A deprecated context object of the application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式設定已被取代的內容物件。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts an encrypted configuration section and returns it as a string.
trans-unit.target: 解密的加密的組態區段，並以字串形式傳回它。

trans-unit.source: An encrypted XML string representing a configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 加密的 XML 字串，表示組態區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A decrypted configuration section as a string.
trans-unit.target: 解密的組態區段，做為字串。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 刪除<xref:System.IO.Stream>工作上的應用程式組態檔的物件執行 I/O。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示名稱的字串<xref:System.IO.Stream>工作上的組態檔的物件執行 I/O。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Encrypts a configuration section and returns it as a string.
trans-unit.target: 加密組態區段，並以字串形式傳回它。

trans-unit.source: An XML string representing a configuration section to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態區段來加密 XML 字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An encrypted configuration section represented as a string.
trans-unit.target: 表示為字串加密的組態區段。

trans-unit.source: Returns the complete path to an application configuration file based on the location subpath.
trans-unit.target: 傳回根據位置子路徑應用程式組態檔的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示應用程式組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The subpath location of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 組態檔的子路徑位置。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the complete path to an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示應用程式組態檔的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Type>物件，代表組態物件的類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type name
trans-unit.target: 型別名稱

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to throw an exception if an error occurs; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果發生錯誤，擲回例外狀況發生時否則，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>物件，代表組態物件的類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representing a type name from the <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，代表從型別名稱<xref:System.Type>物件，代表組態的類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the type name from a <xref:System.Type> object representing the type of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示型別名稱，從<xref:System.Type>物件，代表組態的類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Associates the configuration with a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將相關聯的組態<xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object to associate with the configuration.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>與組態相關的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the configuration host is has completed building associated permissions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示組態主機已完成建置相關的權限;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，代表相關聯的組態檔名稱<xref:System.IO.Stream>工作上的組態檔的物件執行 I/O。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示應用程式組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the configuration file name associated with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> I/O tasks on the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態檔名稱的字串相關聯<xref:System.IO.Stream>I/O 工作上的組態檔。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representing the configuration file name associated with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on a remote configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，代表相關聯的組態檔名稱<xref:System.IO.Stream>遠端組態檔上工作的物件執行 I/O。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the configuration file name associated with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.

trans-unit.source: A string representing a path to a remote configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示遠端組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the configuration file name associated with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.

trans-unit.source: Returns the version of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object associated with configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的版本<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件相關聯組態檔。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.target: 版本<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件相關聯組態檔。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Instructs the host to impersonate and returns an <xref:System.IDisposable> object required by the internal .NET structure.
trans-unit.target: 指示要模擬的主機，並傳回<xref:System.IDisposable>內部.NET 結構所需的物件。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IDisposable>值。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.target: 初始化組態主應用程式。

trans-unit.target: 設定根物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the configuration file is located at a higher level in the configuration hierarchy than the application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出組態檔是否位於在比應用程式組態的組態階層架構中較高層級。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示應用程式組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> the configuration file is located at a higher level in the configuration hierarchy than the application configuration; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>組態檔位於與應用程式設定; 組態階層架構中較高層級否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a child record is required for a child configuration path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否需要子組態路徑子記錄。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path of the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示應用程式組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果子記錄所的子組態路徑。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines if a different <xref:System.Type> definition is allowable for an application configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷不同<xref:System.Type>定義時，才允許應用程式組態物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path of the application configuration file.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a different <xref:System.Type> definition is allowable for an application configuration object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the file path used by a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to read a configuration file is a valid path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出的檔案路徑是否使用<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件來讀取組態檔是有效的路徑。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.target: 表示名稱的字串<xref:System.IO.Stream>工作上的組態檔的物件執行 I/O。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the path used by a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to read a configuration file is a valid path; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果路徑由<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件來讀取組態檔是有效的路徑; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a configuration section requires a fully trusted code access security level and does not allow the <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute> attribute to disable implicit link demands.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，表示組態區段是否需要完全信任程式碼存取安全性層級，且不允許<xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute>屬性，以停用隱含連結要求。</xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the configuration section requires a fully trusted code access security level and does not allow the <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute> attribute to disable implicit link demands; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果需要完全信任程式碼存取安全性層級的組態區段，且不允許<xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute>屬性，以停用隱含連結要求; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the configuration path is trusted.
